comments:
The following Exception is being thrown on EJB Project creation when the XML
model gets out of sync. We need patch for this problem and Chuck has fix in hand
for this problem.

Created an attachment (id=27886)
Patched jarred plugin

The EMF2DOM Renderer was caching the wrong XMLModel id, and subsequent
access/sharing checks failed
